getlux.description: Reads sensor values from the device and returns calculated lux value.
getlux.returns: - lux the calculated illuminance in lux (lx) , - status value indicating success or failure as explained "below": ,     * tsl2561.TSL2561_OK ,     * tsl2561.TSL2561_ERROR_I2CINIT can't initialize I²C bus ,     * tsl2561.TSL2561_ERROR_I2CBUSY I²C bus busy ,     * tsl2561.TSL2561_ERROR_NOINIT initialize I²C bus before calling function ,     * tsl2561.TSL2561_ERROR_LAST

getrawchannels.description: Reads the device's 2 sensors and returns their values.
getrawchannels.returns: - ch0 value of the broad spectrum sensor , - ch1 value of the IR sensor , - status value indicating success or failure as explained "below": ,     * tsl2561.TSL2561_OK ,     * tsl2561.TSL2561_ERROR_I2CINIT can't initialize I²C bus ,     * tsl2561.TSL2561_ERROR_I2CBUSY I²C bus busy ,     * tsl2561.TSL2561_ERROR_NOINIT initialize I²C bus before calling function ,     * tsl2561.TSL2561_ERROR_LAST

init.description: Initializes the device on pins sdapin & sclpin. Optionally also configures the devices address and package. "Default": address pin floating (0x39) and FN package.
init.returns: status value indicating success or failure as explained "below": , - tsl2561.TSL2561_OK , - tsl2561.TSL2561_ERROR_I2CINIT can't initialize I²C bus , - tsl2561.TSL2561_ERROR_I2CBUSY I²C bus busy , - tsl2561.TSL2561_ERROR_NOINIT Initialize I²C bus before calling function , - tsl2561.TSL2561_ERROR_LAST

settiming.description: Sets the integration time and gain settings of the device. When tls2561.init() is called, these values default to 402 ms and no gain.
settiming.returns: status value indicating success or failure as explained "below": , - tsl2561.TSL2561_OK , - tsl2561.TSL2561_ERROR_I2CINIT can't initialize I²C bus , - tsl2561.TSL2561_ERROR_I2CBUSY I²C bus busy , - tsl2561.TSL2561_ERROR_NOINIT initialize I²C bus before calling function , - tsl2561.TSL2561_ERROR_LAST
